nodes.text: Reet was an individual who served as a pilot in the Fleet of the Alliance to Restore the Republic's at the Battle of Endor against the Galactic Empire. Reet died during the fighting and the pilot was listed as a casualty alongside fellow pilots Gemma, Snar and half of Yellow Squadron by a colleague following the Alliance's victory.
Reet was first mentioned in the comic book Shattered Empire 1, which was written by Greg Rucka and published in 2015.
